name: Death Room 4000
description:
This game was submitted as an entry to Ludum Dare 37. The theme was one room. Some features had to be cut such as the announcer and a checkpoint system but these will be added in at a later date.

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=125819

How to play

WASD to move

Space to jump/double jump

left mouse click or J to shoot

or play with a USB controller!

shoot turrets to destroy them, grab prize tickets and make your way to the end of the level.

The cut features will be added in the coming weeks.

Feel free to leave feedback! Especially on the Level Design!
